original_text: And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.
korean_text: 또 우리 형제들이 어린 양의 피와 자기들이 증언하는 말씀으로써 그를 이겼으니 그들은 죽기까지 자기들의 생명을 아끼지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: by the blood of the Lamb
and by the word of their testimony
and they loved not their lives
